SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri ,A.ERROR_DATA AS errorData ,A.ERROR_CODE AS errorCode ,A.ERROR_GRADE AS errorGrade ,A.CREATE_YN AS createYn ,DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS errorTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.ERROR_TIME DESC, A.ID DESC
LIMIT #pageStartIndex#, #pageSize#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri ,A.ERROR_DATA AS errorData ,A.ERROR_CODE AS errorCode ,A.ERROR_GRADE AS errorGrade ,A.CREATE_YN AS createYn ,DATE_FORMAT(A.ERROR_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS errorTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ID > #id#
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.ERROR_TIME DESC, A.ID DESC
LIMIT #limit#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_CONTROL_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri ,A.RESOURCE_NAME AS resourceName ,A.CTL_TYPE AS ctlType ,A.CTL_DATA AS ctlData ,A.CTL_RESULT AS ctlResult ,A.ERROR_CODE AS errorCode ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_CONTROL_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC, A.ID DESC
LIMIT #pageStartIndex#, #pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri ,A.RESOURCE_NAME AS resourceName ,A.DATA AS data ,A.ACTION_TYPE AS actionType ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC, A.ID DESC
LIMIT #pageStartIndex#, #pageSize#

SELECT AVG(CONVERT(DATA, INTEGER)) AS data ,RESOURCE_NAME AS resourceName ,DAYNAME (CREATE_TIME) AS dayName ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = '800000_KEMCTI2_DEVICE_SET_1_DEVICESET001' AND RESOURCE_NAME = 'CO2' GROUP BY dayName(CREATE_TIME)

SELECT AVG(CONVERT(DATA, INTEGER)) AS data ,RESOURCE_NAME AS resourceName ,TIME(CREATE_TIME) AS time ,HOUR(CREATE_TIME) AS hour ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = '800000_KEMCTI2_DEVICE_SET_1_DEVICESET001' AND RESOURCE_NAME = 'CO2' GROUP BY hour(CREATE_TIME)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_FW_UP_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.PACKAGE = #packageName#
AND A.STATUS <> -1

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.PACKAGE AS package ,A.VERSION AS version ,A.STATUS AS status ,A.RESULT AS result ,DATE_FORMAT(A.STATUS_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS statusTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_FW_UP_HIST A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.PACKAGE = #packageName#
AND A.STATUS <> -1
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC, A.ID DESC
LIMIT #pageStartIndex#, #pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_DEVICE_LOGFILE A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.START_TIME >= #startTime#
AND A.START_TIME <= #endTime#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.SN AS sn ,A.PACKAGE AS package ,A.PATH AS path ,A.FILESIZE AS filesize ,DATE_FORMAT(A.START_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.END_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime FROM HDH_DEVICE_LOGFILE A WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_ID = #deviceId#
AND A.START_TIME >= #startTime#
AND A.START_TIME <= #endTime#
ORDER BY A.#orderBy#
ORDER BY A.START_TIME DESC
LIMIT #pageStartIndex#, #pageSize#

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ALARM_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) AS alarmToday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ALARM_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY)) AS alarmBefore1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ALARM_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -2 DAY)) AS alarmBefore2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) AS errorToday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY)) AS errorBefore1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_ERROR_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -2 DAY)) AS errorBefore2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND TRIGGER_TYPE = 'N' AND (ACTION_TYPE IS NULL OR ACTION_TYPE <> 'D') AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY)) AS notiToday, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND TRIGGER_TYPE = 'N' AND (ACTION_TYPE IS NULL OR ACTION_TYPE <> 'D') AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL 0 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY)) AS notiBefore1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE DEVICE_ID = #deviceId# AND TRIGGER_TYPE = 'N' AND (ACTION_TYPE IS NULL OR ACTION_TYPE <> 'D') AND CREATE_TIME <= DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND CREATE_TIME > DATE_ADD(#today#, INTERVAL -2 DAY)) AS notiBefore2 FROM DUAL

SELECT ID AS id ,DEVICE_ID AS deviceId ,MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,SN AS sn ,RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri ,RESOURCE_NAME AS resourceName ,DATA AS data ,ACTION_TYPE AS actionType ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(DATA_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS dataTime FROM HDH_STATUS_HIST WHERE 1=1
AND RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#
ORDER BY DATA_TIME DESC LIMIT 100
